cast.name: 特雷弗·麦克唐纳 Trevor McDonald

this_title: Inside Scotland Yard with Trevor McDonald
trans_title: 与特雷弗·麦克唐纳一起走进苏格兰场
introduction: In this documentary series, Sir Trevor McDonald gains unprecedented access into the Metropolitan Police's headquarters to explore landmark investigations, as Scotland Yard moves to a new home.
chinese_title: 与特雷弗·麦克唐纳一起走进苏格兰场
foreign_title: Inside Scotland Yard with Trevor McDonald
